description: The EYETVSCHED files, along with .EYETV files and other setup information files, such as the .EYETVP file, are located in the "EyeTV Archive" folder. You can move this folder but it must be named "EyeTV Archive" and you must specify in the application where the folder is located.
The EyeTV is only compatible with OS X and iOS although Geniatech develops peripherals that available for Windows and Android devices. Product availability depends on the country in which you reside.
NOTE: Geniatech acquired EyeTV from Elgato in February 2016.
